member.name: T:IdeaBlade.Linq.SortSelector
member.summary: Allows dynamic construction of LINQ OrderBy, OrderByDescending, ThenBy and ThenByDescending expressions.
member.remarks: A SortSelector is a linked list of sort criteria for use in the and extension methods. You may combine any number of SortSelectors to order query results.

member.summary: Determines whether all the elements of a sequence satisfy a condition.

member.name: M:IdeaBlade.Linq.QueryableExtensions.Any(System.Linq.IQueryable)
member.summary: Determines whether a sequence contains any elements.

example.code: var mgr1 = new DomainModelEntityManager(); bool any = mgr1.Customers.Any();

member.name: M:IdeaBlade.Linq.QueryableExtensions.Any(System.Linq.IQueryable,IdeaBlade.Core.IPredicateDescription)
member.summary: Determines whether any element of a sequence satisfies a condition.

example.code: var mgr1 = new DomainModelEntityManager(); bool any = mgr1.Customers.Any(c=> c.Country == "UK");

member.summary: Build a filtered query from the base query and predicate description(s) provided.
member.param: The query to be appended to
A or containing dynamic filter criteria.
member.remarks: Use FilterQuery to create a new query using dynamic filter criteria.

member.name: M:IdeaBlade.Linq.PredicateBuilder.And(IdeaBlade.Core.IPredicateDescription[])
member.summary: Returns a which represents a conditional AND operation.

member.name: M:IdeaBlade.Linq.PredicateBuilder.Or(IdeaBlade.Core.IPredicateDescription[])
member.summary: Returns a which represents a conditional OR operation.

member.name: M:IdeaBlade.Linq.PredicateBuilder.True``1
member.summary: Returns an expression evaluating to true.
member.remarks: Can be used as the base expression when building a dynamic predicate containing an unknown number of expressions.

member.name: M:IdeaBlade.Linq.PredicateBuilder.False``1
member.summary: Returns an expression evaluating to false.
member.remarks: Can be used as the base expression when building a dynamic predicate containing an unknown number of expressions.

member.name: M:IdeaBlade.Linq.PredicateBuilder.And``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}},System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}})
member.summary: Returns an expression which represents a conditional AND operation.
member.param: First operand
Second operation
member.remarks: The resulting expression is an "AndAlso" binary expression, where the second operand will be evaluated only if the first operand is true.

member.name: M:IdeaBlade.Linq.PredicateBuilder.Or``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}},System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}})
member.summary: Returns an expression which represents a conditional OR operation.
member.param: First operand
Second operand
member.remarks: The resulting expression is an "OrElse" binary expression, where the second operand will be evaluated only if the first operand is true.

member.name: M:IdeaBlade.Linq.PredicateBuilder.And``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}}[])
member.summary: Returns an expression which represents a conditional AND operation of the specified operands.
member.param: Expressions to be AND'ed
member.remarks: The resulting expression is an "AndAlso" binary expression of all operands provided.

member.name: M:IdeaBlade.Linq.PredicateBuilder.Or``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}}[])
member.summary: Returns an expression which represents a conditional OR operation of the specified operands.
member.param: Expressions to be OR'ed
member.remarks: The resulting expression is an "OrElse" binary expression of all operands provided.

member.name: T:IdeaBlade.Linq.ExpressionVisitor
member.remarks: This class simply walks an tree without modifying it, but can be used as the base class for more complex visitors. You can also use the static method to return a string representation of an Expression tree for debugging purposes.

member.name: T:IdeaBlade.Linq.AbstractBlock
member.summary: Internal use only - Base class for serializable expression and binding "block" classes.
member.remarks: Contains the dictionary of AbstractBlock to mappings used when serializating and deserializing an expression tree. The constructs the dictionary prior to visiting the expression tree.

member.name: T:IdeaBlade.Linq.SerializedExpression.DynamicTypeInfoLinkedList
member.summary: For internal use only. Inner class to help serialize dynamic type info information and have it deserialize in a specific order

member.name: P:IdeaBlade.Linq.SerializedExpression.DynamicTypeInfoLinkedList.Head
member.summary: Only called during serialization/deserialization. The ParameterTypeWrappers contained within the DynamicTypeInfo will deserialize as the DynamicTypeInfo is deserialized - these can reference a preceding dynamic type, so we need to ensure we deserialize each DynamicTypeInfo one at a time.

member.name: T:IdeaBlade.Linq.SerializingExpressionVisitor
member.summary: Expression tree visitor providing serialization. Serializes an expression tree into an ExpressionBlock tree. Retrieve result from SerializedExpression property.

member.name: T:IdeaBlade.Linq.WrapperInfoFns
member.summary: Internal use only. Use the appropriate wrapper (data contract) based on the serializer in use. DF2012 - currently only have the DCS wrappers.
